comment: Combine the estimates ~ logfacubnd and ~ logfaclbnd , to get ` log ( x ! ) = x log x + O ( x ) ` . Equation 9.2.9 of [Shapiro], p. 329. This is a weak form of the even stronger statement, ` log ( x ! ) = x log x - x + O ( log x ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Apr-2016.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-May-2016.)
